meta.title: AI Architect & CTO | Jacek Janczura
meta.description: AI engineer and AWS cloud architect. Co-founder & CTO at Jaden Data building enterprise LLM/RAG platforms and distributed systems. Available for architecture reviews, prompt engineering, and AI consulting.

hero.title: AI Architect & CTO
hero.subtitle: Transforming operational complexity into competitive advantage
hero.tagline: Co-founder at Jaden Data - building enterprise AI on AWS (and available for consulting)

positioning.p1: I'm Jacek, the Co-founder & CTO of Jaden Data. I build process intelligence-AI-native systems that improve how work gets done in real business operations of your company. I start with your workflow and make it faster, safer, and measurable.
positioning.p2: My core strengths are AI/ML and cloud architecture: enterprise LLM platforms, RAG systems, and event-driven microservices on AWS (Lambda, ECS/Fargate, SNS/SQS). I integrate multi-model stacks (OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Bedrock, Mistral) and deliver for regulated environments (ISO 27001, SOC 2). If you need help shipping, I also take on architecture reviews, prompt engineering + evals, and technical leadership.

highlights.title: Where Process Intelligence Meets Technical Excellence

items.title: Enterprise AI Platforms
items.description: Multi-tenant systems serving 50+ organizations with >1,000 concurrent connections and thousands of requests per second-built for mission-critical operations.

items.title: AWS Architecture (Serverless + Microservices)
items.description: Event-driven systems on AWS (Lambda, ECS/Fargate, SNS/SQS) designed for high throughput, reliability, and cost control.

items.title: Industry-Specific Solutions
items.description: Delivered impact across manufacturing, pharma, finance, startups, and growing companies-always tied to a measurable business outcome.

items.title: Security & Compliance
items.description: Security isn’t an afterthought-it's part of the design. Delivered ISO 27001 and SOC 2 for enterprise platforms under tight timelines.

items.title: LLMs, RAG, and Evaluations
items.description: Multi-model LLM stacks + RAG pipelines, plus repeatable evaluation approaches (tests, metrics, regression) to keep behavior stable over time.

items.title: Senior Technical Leadership
items.description: Scaled an engineering team from 0→10, led delivery end-to-end, and translate business needs into architecture and execution plans teams can ship.

highlights.note: Certified skydiver and diver; wind/kitesurf instructor; snowboarder. These experiences build risk management, clear instruction, calm under pressure, and disciplined preparation-skills that translate directly to technical leadership and building systems that businesses depend on.

items.title: entAIngine
items.description: Enterprise AI platform on AWS for mission-critical process automation. Multi-tenant, high-throughput, and built for regulated environments (ISO 27001, SOC 2).

items.title: Architecture Reviews
items.description: Short, high-signal reviews to de-risk your system: cloud architecture, LLM/RAG design, security posture, scalability, cost, and delivery plan.

items.title: ML Systems (RP-Matcher)
items.description: Machine-learning product matching system delivering 60% faster offer preparation and measurable ranking accuracy (70.7% Top‑1; MRR 0.835).

items.title: AI Architecture Patterns
items.description: Practical lessons from enterprise LLM deployments-how to design systems that serve business processes and stay reliable in production.

contactCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Operations?
contactCta.description: Whether you are a startup, growing company, or established business-if you need help with AWS architecture, LLM/RAG delivery, prompt engineering + evaluations, or technical leadership, let us start with a quick call.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.intro: Quick answers to common questions. For more details, see the About, Projects, and Writing & Talks pages.

items.question: Who is Jacek Janczura?
items.answer: Jacek Janczura is an AI Architect & CTO based in Berlin, Germany. He is the Co-founder & CTO at Jaden Data, building AI-native systems for process intelligence and enterprise operations.

items.question: What is “process intelligence”?
items.answer: Process intelligence means starting from how work actually gets done and then enhancing workflows with AI, automation, and data-driven decisioning-so AI serves the process (not the other way around).

items.question: What do you build?
items.answer: Enterprise LLM platforms, RAG systems, and event-driven cloud architectures-often as multi-tenant SaaS products and process automation systems integrated into real operations.

items.question: What scale have you operated at?
items.answer: Built platforms serving 50+ organizations, handling >1,000 concurrent connections and thousands of requests per second with high-throughput, event-driven microservices on AWS.

items.question: Which industries have you delivered for?
items.answer: Manufacturing, pharmaceutical, financial services and banking, venture capital, real estate, insurance, legal, automotive, e-commerce, telecommunications, energy/cleantech, logistics, and supply chain.

items.question: What is your experience with LLMs and RAG?
items.answer: Designed and shipped enterprise LLM stacks across OpenAI/Azure/Bedrock/Mistral and pioneered RAG services with automated vector database creation using Pinecone, pgvector, and Milvus, including evaluation/test frameworks for AI pipelines.

items.question: Do you work with security and compliance?
items.answer: Yes. Delivered ISO 27001 and SOC 2 in ~3 months for enterprise platforms. Multi-tenant security and RBAC are core architectural concerns in my work.

items.question: How can we work together?
items.answer: I take on freelance work such as architecture reviews (AWS/cloud, LLM/RAG, security, scalability/cost), prompt engineering and evals, hands-on AI delivery, and interim technical leadership / team support.

items.question: How can I contact you?
items.answer: Use the Contact page or reach out via LinkedIn. Share a short problem statement and your target timeline-I'll suggest the fastest way to help.
